reference_summary:
CIMIY Gel Nail Polish Set 8 bottles - Manicure Colors Infinity with Top Base Coat for Forest Nail Art Natural Daily All Seasons for Nail Profession Salon and Starter at Home Soak Off UV LED 0.32oz CIMIY {'Brand': 'CIMIY', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Type': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Glossy', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '1 Count', 'Liquid Volume': '0.3 Fluid Ounces', 'Package Dimensions': '11.54 x 3.58 x 1.22 inches; 11.64 Ounces'} My daughter was sick of paying more money at the salon for them to paint her acrylics, so I got her the "CIMIY Gel Nail Polish Set 8 bottles - Manicure Colors Infinity with Top Base Coat for Forest Nail Art Natural Daily All Seasons for Nail Profession Salon and Starter at Home Soak Off UV LED 0.32oz" to paint her nails with.
This polish requires an LED/UV lamp, so I also had to buy that for her. Other than that, this polish is great. It came with a base coat and a top coat, as well as 6 fall-inspired shades. The polish is very beautiful and doesn't make a huge mess. I had her put them under the lamp for 3 minutes after each coat and wound up using 2 coats of the colored polish on her nails. This gel polish hardens very nicely an doesn't get any dents or fingerprints.
Overall, I recommend this polish to people who are tired of overpaying at the salon. Great polish Gel Nail Polish Set, Glitter 6 Colors Gel Polish Kit Popular Nail Art Design Soak Off LED Lamp Nail Polish Gel Manicure Kit Gifts Set for Girls Women Professional DIY Home Use Anzuo {'Brand': 'Anzuo', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Type': 'gel', 'Finish Type': 'Shimmery', 'Special Feature': 'Long Lasting', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '6.00 Count', 'Number of Items': '6', 'Number of Pieces': '6', 'Product Dimensions': '5.12 x 3.15 x 3.54 inches; 10.23 Ounces'} I grew tired of paying to have my gel done at a salon, so I decided that I would do it myself now. After looking for a while, I decided to get the "ANZUO Shimmer Gel Nail Polish Set Christmas Party 6 Colors UV LED Soak Off Gold Silver Nail Polish Kit for Women" with hopes that it would work well.
I'm glad that I did, because this polish is great. Aside from the fact that the glitter is very messy, this polish is very nice. It is very smooth and hardens quickly, as well. Whenever I went to remove the polish, I could glitter everywhere. I kinda saw it coming, but it was still a little bit annoying. This polish does last quite a long time, though.
Overall, this polish gets a 4 out of 5. If the glitter wasn't so messy, my rating would be higher. Great polish, messy to apply and/or remove Marshique Skin Fit Flat Auto Eyebrow Pencil(Golden Brown)- including Spoolie Brush, Soft Texture, Natural Looking, Long Lasting Marshique {'Brand': 'Marshique', 'Item Form': 'Pencil', 'Finish Type': 'Natural', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Product Benefits': 'Softening,Long Lasting', 'Package Dimensions': '5.63 x 0.67 x 0.67 inches; 0.32 Ounces'} I was tired of paying twenty dollars for my eyebrow pencils, so when I found the "Marshique Skin Fit Flat Auto Eyebrow Pencil(Golden Brown)- including Spoolie Brush, Soft Texture, Natural Looking, Long Lasting" I didn't hesitate to get it.
This eyebrow pencil is very natural-looking and easy to apply. The spoolie is very soft and brushes through any brow in any condition.
I love the way my brows look after using this brow. You can definitely tell the difference, but its not too noticeable to others the way other pencils are.
Overall, this pencil is a five star pencil! Amazing! Great, very natural-looking Purple Shampoo and Conditioner Set - Blonde Shampoo - Made in USA - Purple Hair Silver Shampoo - Hair Toner Shampoo & Conditioner for Brassy Hair - Purple Toning Shampoo & Overtone Conditioner WELLUTION {'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating,Shine,Nourishing', 'Brand': 'WELLUTION', 'Hair Type': 'Curly', 'Scent': 'Natural', 'Number of Items': '2', 'Package Dimensions': '7.5 x 3.8 x 2 inches; 1.2 Pounds', 'UPC': '749715278457'} I got this shampoo and conditioner Purple Shampoo and Conditioner Set - Blonde Shampoo - Made in USA - Purple Hair Silver Shampoo - Hair Toner Shampoo & Conditioner for Brassy Hair - Purple Toning Shampoo & Overtone Conditioner as everyone recommends it for blonde beauties. Both my kids are blonde haired and we have well water. I have only used this for a week in the hair and can see a difference in their hair. It is definitely worth getting and making sure your hair looks amazing! PURPLE! Msmofei Make up Brushes 14PCs Makeup Brush Set Professional Premium Synthetic Foundation Blending Face Powder Eye Shadows Blush Makeup Brush Kit Green Comestic Brushes with Green leather Case MSmofei {'Brand': 'MSmofei', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'For Eyeshadow, Contour, For Setting Powder, For Blush, For Foundation, Eyebrow', 'Material': 'Synthetic', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Number of Pieces': '14', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Ferrule Material': 'Copper', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Item Dimensions LxWxH': '137.52 x 106.32 x 28.32 inches', 'Product Dimensions': '137.52 x 106.32 x 28.32 inches; 8.15 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'AA1', 'UPC': '608571247291'} These brushes are very soft. They are my favorite by far. I have tried cheap ones in the past. They really were not the best but these are soft blend your makeup good and cheap. Now if you are just learning these can be good cause you have a lot of options for different looks. They are great!!
profile:
**Updated User Profile Summary:**

- **Primary Interest:** At-home nail care and manicure, with an expanded focus on eyebrow grooming, hair care, and now makeup application techniques.
- **Product Preference:** Prefers gel polish for durability and professional finish, champions non-toxic and cruelty-free beauty products, and has shown increased interest in quality makeup tools. The user is focused on hair care that targets brassy tones, prioritizing hydrating, nourishing products that enhance shine. Seeks vibrant, glittery nail designs and practical options for eyebrows while embracing comprehensive makeup solutions.
- **Usage Context:** Frequently engages in DIY beauty routines, including nail art and makeup applications, maintaining a family-oriented approach, particularly in hair care for children. The user budgets efficiently, continuing to explore effective eyebrow makeup and versatile brushes for varied looks.
- **Behavior Patterns:** Emphasizes quality and effectiveness, looking for reliable products that enhance self-expression and aesthetics across nails, brows, hair, and makeup. Values ease of use, long-lasting results, and minimal mess in all beauty endeavors.
- **Target Audience:** Seeks products suitable for both personal and family use, adopting a practical, budget-conscious mindset.
- **Seasonal Considerations:** Prefers products that align with seasonal beauty themes, showcasing an interest in versatile options that cater to all beauty categories.
- **User Experience:** Dedicated to optimizing the at-home beauty experience, expressing satisfaction with high-performing items across nails, brows, hair, and the latest addition of effective makeup application tools.
